statements: SELECT * FROM advertisers;
SELECT advertiser_name, ad_engagement_ratio FROM advertisers;
SELECT * FROM advertisers WHERE ad_engagement_ratio > 0.5;
SELECT advertiser_name AS Name, influencer_name AS Influencer FROM advertisers;
SELECT * FROM advertisers ORDER BY ad_engagement_ratio DESC;
SELECT * FROM advertisers WHERE ad_engagement_ratio > 0.5;
SELECT advertiser_name, ad_engagement_ratio FROM advertisers WHERE influencer_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM advertisers;
SELECT * FROM advertisers ORDER BY advertiser_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT influencer_name FROM advertisers WHERE ad_engagement_ratio < 0.3;
SELECT * FROM Advertisers;
SELECT advertiser_name, ad_engagement_metric FROM Advertisers ORDER BY advertiser_name DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers WHERE social_media_platform = 'Instagram';
SELECT advertiser_name, ad_engagement_metric FROM Advertisers WHERE partnership_id = 123;
SELECT influencer_id, social_media_platform, followers_count FROM Influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Advertisers WHERE advertiser_name = 'Coca Cola';
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 100000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT advertiser_name, ad_engagement_metric FROM Advertisers WHERE ad_engagement_metric IN ('High', 'Medium') ORDER BY ad_engagement_metric;
SELECT influencer_name, social_media_platform, followers_count FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY influencer_name ASC, followers_count DESC;
SELECT advertiser_name AS Advertiser, partnership_id AS PartnershipID FROM Advertisers WHERE partnership_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM advertisers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, industry FROM advertisers WHERE industry = 'Fashion';
SELECT id, name, followers FROM influencers WHERE followers > 100000;
SELECT * FROM ad_engagement WHERE engagement_rate > 0.05 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT influencers.name, ad_engagement.engagement_rate FROM influencers JOIN ad_engagement ON influencers.id = ad_engagement.influencer_id WHERE ad_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM advertisers;
SELECT name, industry FROM advertisers WHERE industry='Fashion';
SELECT influencers.name, ad_engagement.engagement_rate FROM influencers JOIN ad_engagement ON influencers.id = ad_engagement.influencer_id;
SELECT ad_engagement.ad_id, COUNT(influencers.id) AS influencer_count FROM ad_engagement JOIN influencers ON ad_engagement.influencer_id = influencers.id GROUP BY ad_id;
SELECT id, name, SUM(followers) AS total_followers FROM influencers WHERE followers > 10000 GROUP BY id, name ORDER BY total_followers DESC;
SELECT * FROM advertisers;
SELECT advertiser_name, ad_campaign FROM advertisers WHERE advertiser_id = 1;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'like' AND engagement_count > 100;
SELECT ad_id, ad_spend, ad_performance_score FROM ad_performance ORDER BY ad_spend DESC;
SELECT * FROM advertisers;
SELECT advertiser_name, ad_campaign FROM advertisers WHERE ad_campaign='Social Media';
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT ad_id, engagement_type, engagement_count FROM ad_engagement WHERE engagement_count > 100 ORDER BY engagement_count DESC;
SELECT ad_performance.ad_id, ad_performance.ad_spend, ad_performance_score, advertisers.advertiser_name FROM ad_performance JOIN advertisers ON ad_performance.advertiser_id=advertisers.advertiser_id;
SELECT * FROM Advertisers
SELECT advertiser_name, contact_email FROM Advertisers ORDER BY advertiser_name DESC
SELECT influencer_name, social_media_handle FROM Influencers LIMIT 3
SELECT ad_title, ad_cost FROM Ads WHERE ad_cost > 100 ORDER BY ad_cost ASC
SELECT ads.ad_title, engagements.engagement_date FROM Ads ads JOIN Engagements engagements ON ads.ad_id = engagements.ad_id
SELECT * FROM Advertisers ORDER BY advertiser_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT advertiser_name, contact_email FROM Advertisers WHERE advertiser_id = 3
SELECT influencer_name, social_media_handle FROM Influencers WHERE social_media_handle LIKE '%instagram%'
SELECT ad_title, ad_cost FROM Ads WHERE ad_cost > 1000 ORDER BY ad_cost ASC
SELECT * FROM Engagements JOIN Ads ON Engagements.ad_id = Ads.ad_id WHERE engagement_type = 'like'
